did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1983-1984

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.861, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred on 1986 June 19.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general and admistrative committee files, 1983-1984; and, permanent files, 1959-1985.

Permanent records concern: Cyprus; Affirmative Action, Equal Opportunity reports (including Jacobs Report and the Status of Women Faculty Report); Robb's executive orders; Law School; Rare Books library; Board of Visitors; and various individuals, including Mrs. R.M. Jeffress and W.L. Zimmer.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Files, 1983-1984 Boxes 1-27
Series II: Administrative Committees Files, 1983-1984 Boxes 27-28
Series III: Permanent Files, 1959-1985 Boxes 29-37
Series IV: Restricted Material, 1959-1985 Boxes 38
